name: Great Ocean Truck
description:
Time to move out! You have a big mission to to pile up all the furniture and anything else you can  onto this little truck. The more you manage to stack things, the more points you earn.  Use the rope, glue and the balloons to keep it all steady, and have fun!

Use your mouse to left click on the objects and drag them onto the truck. You may also rotate the objects while you are dragging them by clicking on the right mouse button.
